thread.title_full: BeyoncÃ© Slays With Theatrical Performance at the Grammys | Complex

author: Shawn Setaro
title: BeyoncÃ© Slays With Theatrical Performance at Grammys
text:
BeyoncÃ© Slays With Theatrical Performance at the Grammys By Shawn Setaro Shawn is the host of The Cipher , a critically acclaimed hip-hop podcast that conducts in-depth interviews with the genreâ€™s most interesting and important figures. He is a regular contributor at Forbes .
Shawn is also the former editor-in-chief of Rap Genius, and has written about music and culture for The Atlantic, Vibe, The Source, GQ, Esquire, The Sondheim Review, and more.
 Media via Vidme It would be near-impossible to have a more highly-anticipated performance than BeyoncÃ© at the Grammys. Add in her recent pregnancy announcement , and excitement could hardly get any higher.
And somehow, Queen Bey managed to rise above even the most exalted expectations. She performed a medley of "Love Drought" and "Sandcastles" while wearing a suitably queen-like gold dress and headpiece. Surrounded by tons of dancers and crazy set pieces, she managed to make the performance seem simultaneously huge and intimate, even while being suspended dangerously in a chair.
Viewers were blown away not only by the theatrical performance, but by the fact that Bey did it all while visibly expecting.
BeyoncÃ© performed at the Grammy's while pregnant y'all I can't even make myself a sandwich if I have period cramps
